com.mood.jenaPlus

Class OfflineDataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mood.jenaPlus.OfflineDataController

  • public class OfflineDataController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as a controller that handles offline behavior. It communicates between the various View classes where data inputted by the user needs to be saved locally and synced to the server once connection is re-established and the Model classes where those functionalities are implemented. Created by Cecilia and Julienne on 2017-03-28.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • getOfflineParticipant

        public Participant getOfflineParticipant()
        Retrieves a Participant to save moods locally to.
        Returns:
        Participant who is currently using the app

      • SyncOfflineList

        public void SyncOfflineList(android.content.Context context)
        Synchronizes changes made locally to the server. It loads the list saved locally, uses it to update the user in the elastic search server.
        Parameters:
        context - the context passed in to know where the user currently is in the app

      • loadSavedList

        public UserMoodList loadSavedList(android.content.Context context)
        Loads the user's saved moodlist. It uses the participant's unique ID to obtain the saved list.
        Parameters:
        context - the context passed to know where the user currently is in the app
        Returns:
        the UserMoodList that is the user's moodlist that was saved locally

      • saveOfflineList

        public void saveOfflineList(UserMoodList moodList,
                            android.content.Context context)
        Saves the user's moodlist locally. It uses the participant's unique ID to save the list.
        Parameters:
        moodList - the UserMoodList of moods to be saved locally
        context - the context passed to know where the user currently is in the app
